content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet i love these soft sweet baby shoes the crochet pattern is easy and you can use any sport weight or 3 weight yarn if you achieve gauge 1 easy to read crochet pattern 2 easy to find yarn 3 super fast to crochet 4 coordinating over brook dress crochet pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/over-brook-baby-dress 1 these adorable baby shoes are perfect for keeping your little one s feet warm and stylish they are crocheted in a simple stitch pattern that is easy to follow even for beginners the shoes are made with soft yarn that can be found at michaels or use any dk or 3 weight yarn you have in your stash the over brook baby shoes crochet pattern includes detailed instructions so you can be sure that your shoes will turn out perfectly copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2023 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/over-brook-baby-dress
